TopicTitle: How does one modify cloud configs for rescaled planets?

Articles.Content:
This is a completely dewy-eyed question that will probably end with crushing despair as to the amount of effort involved...

Assume I have a set of cloud configs for E.V.E. that works perfectly fine with the stock KSP planets for which it was built.

Also assume I have a mod that rescales all celestial bodies in the system, making them bigger.

Do I have to do anything to make the cloud configs compatible? If yes: what must I do?
They should scale up automatically. EVE is good about that.
